articles.title: Geologists Discover a Critical Kill Mechanism Behind a 350 Million-Year-Old Series of Extinctions - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A major oil source in North America reveals insights into one of the planet's most devastating mass extinctions. The Bakken Shale Formation, spanning an area of 200,000 square miles beneath parts of Canada and North Dakota, has been a prolific source of oil a…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of MarylandApril 15, 2023
The Bakken Shale Formation has offered a new insight into Earths geological history, revealing a major trigger for several biotic crises during the late Devoni… [+6417 chars]
